title: Buns in the Oven
description: A BBW RomanceWhen my brother and I open up our new café, the first customer we get is my brother’s friend—Wes, who looks way different than the geeky guy I remember from high school. As in...he’s now jaw-droppingly hot. When Wes asks me out, you can bet I say yes. Our first date is magical. But a few weeks later, I learn something that flips my world upside down. Is our relationship doomed?  BUNS IN THE OVEN is a fun, short, BBW instalove romance that's steamy, sweet, and has a happily-ever-after!
author: Kate Hunt
